subject: Tennis
Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The clay-court struggles of top-ranked Rafael Nadal worsened Friday as his 41-match winning streak at the Barcelona Open ended with a loss to Nicolás Almagro in the quarterfinals.
snippet: The clay-court struggles of top-ranked Rafael Nadal worsened Friday as his 41-match winning streak at the Barcelona Open ended with a loss to Nicolás Almagro in the quarterfinals.
